result.reason: Multiple users confirm right shift is silently dropped in the mRemoteNG RDP ActiveX layer when CRD injects keyboard events without the extended-key flag (scan code 0x36); other RDP clients handle this correctly, so the fix belongs in mRemoteNG's keyboard handling.
result.approach: Intercept WM_KEYDOWN/WM_KEYUP for VK_SHIFT in the RDP control host and inspect the scan code (0x36 = right shift) to synthesize the correct VK_RSHIFT event before forwarding to the MsTscAxClient, compensating for CRD stripping the extended-key bit.

attempts.raw_output:
